Detailed Description

Implementation of the commit dialog. This dialog is used to choose file to be commited and message to be assigned at the operations.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Qt::WFlags  f = Qt::MSWindowsFixedSizeDialogHint 
)

Constructor of the commit dialog. The dialog as a windows flag who said the flag is not resizable.

Parameters:
parent Parent of the dialog
f Flags to use on Windows. By default, the dialog have a fixed size.

Member Function Documentation

int CommitMessageDialogImpl::exec (  )  [slot]

Redefine the exec function. When this function is called if the function setFilesOperation aren't called then a message is popup (There is nothing to do).

Reimplemented from QDialog.

RCS::FilesOperation CommitMessageDialogImpl::filesOperation (  ) 

Return the file list. If file is unchecked then the mode RCS::Nothing is set.

Returns:
Return the list of files the user whant to commit.
QString CommitMessageDialogImpl::messages (  ) 

Return the message define by the user.

Returns:
The message to be sent to CVS.
void CommitMessageDialogImpl::setFilesOperation ( RCS::FilesOperation  files  ) 

Set the list of file to be commited. If the file as mode RCS::RemoveAndCommit or AddAndCommit the file is not checked in the list. If the mode is RCS::Commit the file is checked.

Parameters:
files List of files who ca be add/remove and commited
void CommitMessageDialogImpl::setMessages ( const QString &  message  ) 

Defines the default message to be commited. The message is show in the dialog. The user can change the message.

Parameters:
message Message to be stocked when commit is called.
